name: Flappy Blork
description:
Brand new to Unity and game development, so I made a Flappy Bird clone using Game Maker's Toolkit's tutorial. Enjoy the blursed fruits of my labor.

--

Press [Space] to make Blork go urk. Don't touch the pillars.

--

If you're using Brave browser, there will be no sound in the in-browser version. Switch to a different browser, or use the downloaded version.
